alerts.name: Pipeline Failed Runs Alert
alerts.description: Triggers when any pipeline run fails in the last hour

query.sql: SELECT run_id, stage, status, start_time, end_time, details FROM system.pipeline_runs WHERE status = 'failed' AND start_time >= NOW() - INTERVAL 1 HOUR

alerts.name: Pipeline Stale Stage Alert
alerts.description: Triggers when a pipeline stage has not run successfully in the last 6 hours

query.sql: SELECT stage, MAX(end_time) AS last_success_time FROM system.pipeline_runs WHERE status = 'success' GROUP BY stage HAVING MAX(end_time) < NOW() - INTERVAL 6 HOURS
